name: Pan Roasted Brussels Sprouts Subzi with Cumin and Mustard Seeds
description: Pan Roasted Brussels Sprouts Subzi with Cumin and Mustard Seeds. Easy Spiced Brussels Sprouts. Serve in a bowl with Dal and Rice or as a side. Vegan gluten-free Soy-free Indian Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 6 to 8  fresh or frozen curry leaves (optional)
2  cups Brussels sprouts (tough stems removed and halved or quartered)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat., When hot, add cumin and mustard seeds and cook until they change color or start to pop.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat., When hot, add cumin and mustard seeds and cook until they change color or start to pop.

recipeInstructions.text: Add curry leaves, garlic and chili carefully. Cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add curry leaves, garlic and chili carefully. Cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add brussels sprouts and toss well. Cook for 4 to 5 minutes until some edges get golden brown. Stir once or twice in between.
recipeInstructions.name: Add brussels sprouts and toss well. Cook for 4 to 5 minutes until some edges get golden brown. Stir once or twice in between.

recipeInstructions.text: Add sesame seeds, mix in and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add sesame seeds, mix in and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add ground spices, salt and mix in and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ground spices, salt and mix in and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1/4 cup or more water. Cover and cook for 7 to 9 minutes. This will steam the sprouts.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1/4 cup or more water. Cover and cook for 7 to 9 minutes. This will steam the sprouts.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and heat. Add a dash of lemon and cilantro and serve with your favorite Indian meal or Buddha Bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and heat. Add a dash of lemon and cilantro and serve with your favorite Indian meal or Buddha Bowl.
